channel.title: Ml on Jozef Sukovsky
channel.description: Recent content in Ml on Jozef Sukovsky

item.title: TBA
item.description: There is this hype of generative AI. Which usually is presented in a simplified manner of just “the AI”. It is like the cool kid. And like there was no ML/AI before. Just the age of darkness. The opposite is true. The term artificial intellingence (AI) is here since WWII and machine learning (ML) since 1960’s. And there were, and still are many fields which benefit from it, without being widely recognized.
